body: Is there any decent doujinsh between Boruto and sarada?
See this @bene being salt in every sasuke doujin calling others salt. what a cunt.
@frak111 You tried, but you are dead wrong xd According to Kishimoto they are more than in love when they are alone and I think, that creator of Naruto knows more, than some lonely virgin ;)

@Frak111 were you raped by a sasusaku fan for you to be this salty? Sasuke didn't neglect her ever, he went on a mission precisely to protect his family. There is enough material in the manga, novels, author statements to suggest that Sasuke shows his softer side and is indeed very lovey dovey towards his wife. Their marriage is the best in the entire series, they understand each other, support each other, very loving, extremely loyal. Uchiha family is easily the best in the series. Gtfo

Goddamnit. I've been wanting to see something like this for a long time. These guys can use transformation jutsu, why can't they make one of themselves younger and have hot sex? I wanna see so many adult x genin for each of the couples.
Haha such salt,  they've been fucking since got back in the movie
It's funny seeing all of these Sasuke/Sakura hentais where they are all lovey-dovey because in reality, Sasuke neglects the shit out of Sakura and they have the worst marriage in the entire series.
